page.title: 12CLUBS CHURCH MARKFIELD
page.content: Through the years the Methodist Church in Markfield has been a focal point for many people both spiritually and socially.Today the church building is used not only for church activities but also to serve the community in other ways such as a Play Group, Dancing School,Theatre Group,singing groups and children's parties.On Sundays there are two services and a Sunday School for children between 3 and 14 years.Fellowship meetings for adults and young people take place through the week and there is an Open Door activities afternoon for the elderly.Within the church there is a healthy balance of young and old and the activities serve to bring them all together.
